title: Transfer Function
description: Ratio of Laplace transform of output to input with zero initial conditions

title: Characteristic Equation
description: Denominator of transfer function set to zero; roots are system poles

title: Laplace Transform of Derivative
description: Laplace transform of first derivative with initial condition

title: Laplace Transform of Integral
description: Laplace transform of definite integral

title: First-Order Transfer Function
description: Standard form where K is gain and τ is time constant

title: Second-Order Transfer Function
description: Standard form with natural frequency ωn and damping ratio ζ

title: Time Constant Response
description: Step response of first-order system; reaches 63.2% at t = τ

title: Damping Ratio Classification
description: ζ<1 underdamped, ζ=1 critically damped, ζ>1 overdamped

title: Settling Time (2%)
description: Time to reach and stay within 2% of final value

title: Peak Time
description: Time to reach first peak in underdamped response

title: Maximum Overshoot
description: Maximum peak value as fraction of final value

title: Steady-State Error (Step Input)
description: For unity feedback system with step input; Kp is position error constant

title: Steady-State Error (Ramp Input)
description: For unity feedback system with ramp input; Kv is velocity error constant

title: Steady-State Error (Parabolic Input)
description: For unity feedback system with parabolic input; Ka is acceleration error constant

title: Routh Stability Criterion
description: All coefficients of characteristic equation must be positive

title: Gain Margin
description: Factor by which gain can increase before instability

title: Phase Margin
description: Additional phase lag before instability; ωc is gain crossover frequency

title: PID Controller Transfer Function
description: Parallel form with proportional, integral, and derivative gains

title: State-Space Representation
description: Linear time-invariant system in matrix form

title: Closed-Loop Transfer Function
description: For negative feedback with forward path G(s) and feedback H(s)

title: Nyquist Stability Criterion
description: Z=closed-loop RHP poles, N=clockwise encirclements of -1, P=open-loop RHP poles

title: Root Locus Magnitude Condition
description: Points on root locus satisfy this magnitude condition

title: Root Locus Angle Condition
description: Phase condition for points on root locus

title: Asymptote Centroid
description: Intersection point of asymptotes on real axis

title: Asymptote Angles
description: Angles of asymptotes for k = 0, 1, 2, ...
